meanings.definition: The small circular area of colored skin around the nipple.
meanings.sent1: Her areolas were a shade darker than the rest of her skin.
meanings.sent2: The nurse examined the patient's areolas during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: When the baby saw the areolas, he giggled uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The areolas were like tiny suns in the vast sky of her chest.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully painted the model's areolas with precision.

meanings.definition: Areolas are typically darker in color than the surrounding skin.
meanings.sent1: The areolas of the model stood out against her fair complexion.
meanings.sent2: During pregnancy, some women notice changes in their areolas.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his areolas had a better tan than he did.
meanings.sent4: Her areolas were like two little shadows on her chest.
meanings.sent5: The areolas resembled tiny chocolate chips on a vanilla cake.
